title: Mike Downey (producer) - Wikipedia
snippet: Michael Downey OBE is an Irish-British film producer.

title: Awards — Official website of Mike Downey, a film producer, writer, director, commentator and activist
snippet: Best Debut Irish Feature, Best First Feature, Galway Film Fleadh, Galway, Ireland, 2019

title: Mike Downey elected new EFA chairman - Cineuropa
snippet: The members of the European Film Academy (EFA) have elected Mike Downey, Irish producer and CEO of Film and Music Entertainment (F&ME), as new chairman of the EFA board.

title: Mike Downey | Producer, Actor, Writer
snippet: Mike Downey. Producer: Elvis Walks Home. Mike Downey, producer, and CEO of Film and Music Entertainment (F&ME), launched his independent UK production company on the Frankfurt DAX in 2009.

title: Downey Ink. unveils ambitious slate of projects after premiering Girls on Wire in Berlinale's competition - Cineuropa
snippet: “As the name of the company would suggest,” adds Downey, “Downey Ink. is also a vehicle for my continued participation in films as an author. Later in the year, we will announce a couple more major projects that I will also be writing ...
